column5: After two good years & three days of charging this spring in boat slip my Quest 2620 quite working. My question is:can this unit be repaired or have I got what I can get out of this unit? Thanks for any replys. Tom
Take the cover off the unit-mine had a fuse in it that was easy to replace. It is worth a try.
Call Quest, I am sure you will be both surprised and happy with the the response you will get.
